channel.title: Quotes on Prasenjit Manna
channel.description: Recent content in Quotes on Prasenjit Manna

item.title: notes-to-self
item.description: notes to self Hard choices, easy life. Easy choices, hard life. The deeper you go, the better it gets. You’ll never regret a workout Gift time, not things. Everything will be different in six months. Write your goals down. Cross ’em out. Write new ones. Email the people you admire and tell them that. It’ll make their day. And it’ll make yours when they write back. Learning is a lifelong process.
